task.summary: Default task
initial copy
buggy bank acc balance
buggy bank acc balance
Changed all uuid > accountID so that we can have inter account transfers
Added 2 functions in Bank to get account by searching an id, so we can make third party transfers
new balance field in Account class to keep track of each account's balance.

Changes: 1) shortened a lot of code for withdraw/transfer/deposit by converting repeated code into Utils.java functions 2) added 'balance' attribute to Account class no longer need to loop through all transactions everytime we want to get an account balance (more efficient)
fixed nextLine issues with logging in

added connection to mysql, added DB_Util class which i will slowly fill with diff sql statements. Added bankID and local fields to Bank class and updated its constructor in main, we now fetch a list of banks from mysql, and user can choose which bank he wants to use.

DONE: removed redundant Util.addAccountTransaction function added Account.addInternalTransaction() this is for withdrawals and deposits
added DB_Util.generateTransactionID to generate a new txn id when creating a new txn
Updated Transaction constructors : theres 2, 1 for new i transactions, 1 for existing transactions that is only used when we import transactiosn from sql. NOTE: receiverID field is -1 if it is an internal transaction such as deposit/withdrawal
Updated database schema to change hashedPin to char(64), previously 45 couldnt fit SHA256. Updated customers.csv to reflect new SHA256 hash yall need to re import everyth..
withdrawals and deposits will now update SQL transaction!!
NOT WORKING: external transfer , i havent do i commented them out for now

DONE: third party transactions are now SQL-ized
depositFunds and withdrawFunds merged into 1 function!! easy easy easy previously forgot to update balance on SQL after withdrawing / depositing, now will update
DONE: removed conn everywhere and made it global omg code is so much cleaner now
DONE: fixed account add
DONE: fixed some system outs
DONE: fixed deletion of sql account fixed some numbers in user chioce
DONE: fixed account creation
DONE: fixed account creation
DONE: fixed account creation prints
DONE: changed database schema so that each user has different password for each bank instead of 1 password for all banks.
DONE: Fixed logging in to bank where the user doesnt have an account in that particular bank, but has an account in another bank.
DONE: Updated database schema file

DONE: - removed all user inputs from transfer functions so that unit testing is doable. (fixed tims previous commit)
- added a file called Strings.java where we will print common strings, i will slowly move our stuff over there so that our code is cleaner and easier to read
DONE: - fixed sign up SQL functions

Changed all uuid > accountID so that we can have inter account transfers
Added 2 functions in Bank to get account by searching an id, so we can make third party transfers
